card.name: Ancient Burial Site
card.text: Playable during the site phase at a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Hoard minor items may be played at the site. If the site has an Undead automatic-attack, you may also play gold ring items there. If Banishment is played on the site, you may play hoard major items there.

card.name: Angmarim Tribesmen
card.text: Men. 4 strikes. Playable keyed to Angmar, Gundabad and Misty Mountains Northern Spur. If Angmar Arises, Doors of Night or a manifestation of The Witch-king of Angmar is in play, may also be played keyed to Arthedain, Forochel, Everdalf and Rhudaur. This attack is cancelled if you have Angmarim in play or if you are The Witch-king.

card.name: Annayulma
card.text: Unique. Treasure. Playable at Goblin-gate.tap allow bearer's company to be affected by Healing of Nimrodel if either starting or site of destination is a Haven [H] as long as the company is attempting to move through a Wilderness [w]. Annayulma does not untapped normally, but only if a sage bearer taps at a Haven [H] or if Enchanted Stream or River is played against bearer's company.

attr.value: Undead — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC.

Sapling of the White Tree may be stored here for 2 mp, if Rebuild the Town has been played on this site; discard a Sapling stored at this site to play The White Tree (replacing all occurrences of Minas Tirith with Annúminas).
Undead — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC.
1 non-unique Dúnadan hazard creature may be played (not counting against the hazard limit) against a minion company moving to this site, regardless of other cards played.

card.name: Arathorn II
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Elves and Dúnedain. +2 EI against Rangers of the North faction.-2 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Ardagor
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Leader. Can use spirit- magic. +2 prowess against Orcs. +2 EI against Trolls. Discard on a body check result of 9. Unless he is at a Darkhaven [K], discard any Orc characters in his company.

card.name: Ardagor
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Warlord. Manifestation of Ardagor. Leader. Can use spirit-magic. +2 prowess against Orcs. +5 EI against Trolls. When he is at any of his home sites, you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Discard any Orc characters in his company. tap: take Warlord’s Lair from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Beffraen
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in Eriador that is a Hidden Site if the influence check is greater than 7.Standard modifications: none.

card.name: Blood Money
card.text: Diplomat only. Playable on a diplomat in a covert company facing a non-detainment attack by Elves, Dwarves, Dúnedain or Men before strikes have been assigned. Discard if none of your characters are wounded by the attack. Discard if any 1 of your companies ever defeats an attack by Elves, Dwarves, Dúnedain or Men.

card.name: Bloodeye Ravish
card.text: Disease. Playable on a Horse ally. At the start of its movement/hazard phase the ally must make a body check, modified by +1 if moving through a region in Eriador, -2 if the ally is unique, and - 2 if moving through a Dark- domain [d], Desert [e] or region in the Northern Waste. During your end-of-turn phase make a body check for any other Horse ally in the company: if succesfull the ally is not wounded but also effected by Bloodeye Ravish (place a token on it). Discard a card with a healing effect from the company to discard Bloodeye Ravish.

card.name: Brandir
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves.You may take Brandir to hand from discard pile or play deck when you successfully influence the Rangers of the North faction.

card.name: Brutal Retinue
card.text: Warlord only. Half-troll. May not be among your starting characters. Must be controlled by a Warlord EI (ignore any race restrictions in company composition). Discard if not controlled by a Warlord, or to cancel a strike against his controlling Warlord. Discard on a body check result of 9.

card.name: Burgling Miserably
card.text: Scout only. Playable on a non-overt scout at a Free- hold [F], Border-hold [B], or Ruins & Lairs [R]. Tap scout if untapped. One Swag may be placed with this card. Any Swag placed with this card may be played on the company as if from hand and may be discarded from the company as if a treasure item.

card.name: Causeways and Canals
card.text: Playable on an “un-Sieged” Port or Swamp site, if you have a faction at the site affected by Profitable Trade. The site’s type moves one step closer to a Free-hold [F], if already, it also becomes a Ballte-ground (and you receives this card’s mp). During your end-of turn phase, place a token on this card if a the associated site is “sieged”, discard this card when 3 tokens are on.

card.name: Cave-goblins
card.text: Playable at any Under-deeps sites, whose surface site is a Ruins & Lairs [R] if the influence check is greater than 8.Standard Modifications: Orc (+2), Leader (+2), Uruk-hai (-3), Troll (- 5). tap: take a Fungi from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Cave-trolls
card.text: Unique. Playable at Creb Durga or The Under-caves if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Stone Trolls (-2). Once in play, the number required to influence this faction is 0. If this influence attempt is made by an Orc or Troll leader, you may place this faction under the control of that leader and not tap the site. Discard the faction if the leader moves or leaves play. 3 or more factions controlled by the same leader give 2 extra mp.

card.name: Clan-bound
card.text: Grey or White player only. Playable on a starting company in lieu of minor item. If the starting company contains 2 or more unique characters with the same home site, at which a unique faction is playable that has at least 2 manifestations (or is a dual resource), you may play as a normal character any character with the same home site (mind restrictions still apply).

card.name: Concealed Entrance
card.text: Playable during the site phase at a Hidden Site. Place this card on the site. Unless they tap a scout, your opponent’s companies cannot enter the site. Discard when any play deck is exhausted or when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

attr.value: (1st) Orcs — 2 strikes with 6 prowess (2nd) Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess
(1st) Orcs — 2 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against overt companies); (2nd) Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against overt companies).
Any non-unique Orc or Troll character may be brought into play at this site during the organization phase.

card.name: Crebain from Dunland
card.text: Unique. Playable at any non-Haven site in Dunland if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Saruman is your Wizard (+3), you have Sharkú in play (+5). tap: look at 3 random cards from your opponent’s hand.

card.name: Dagnirdraug
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Osteledan. Also playable at any site in Hollin if you discard (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card from the company. +2 prowess to a maximum of 9. Warrior only: +4 to prowess against Wolves (to a maximum of 10). tap: if Wake of War is in play to take a strike from a Wolf attack another character in the company is facing. Bearer makes a CC.

attr.value: Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC.
Any non-unique Undead creature may be played at this site.
Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC.
Any non-unique Undead creature may be played at this site.
If Angmar Arises is in play, creatures playable keyed to Angmar are keyable to this site. You receive 2 mp if you have an unique faction in play at this site.
You receive 2 mp if you have an unique faction in play at this site, while Reunited Kingdom is in play by an opponent.

card.name: Fire Unwatched
card.text: Playable on a non-stage resource permanent- event played on a Haven [H] or Free-hold [F]. Discard the event and wound a character at the site (no body check required). Alternatively, playable on a Dwarven Alchemist or Forge-master character at a Haven [H]. Wound target character and make a body check.

card.name: Forest-troll
card.text: Forest-troll. Discard on a body check result of 7. +1 prowess against Ents and Awakened Plants.-1 to all CC.

attr.value: Any non-Dragon's lair Ruins & Lairs in a Wilderness

card.name: Ghost-warriors of Dunfearan
card.text: Unique. Playable at the Ghost-caves by a sage bearing Ghostbane, or by Aragorn II if Return of the King is in play. tap: any Gold Chains in the Wind you have in play is not discarded until the end-of-turn phase. tap: and discard an Undead creature from hand to cancel an attack against one of your companies.

card.name: Ghostbane
card.text: Unique. Staff. Playable at The Riddle-caves.+2 prowess against Undead. This item affects a Ringwraith. If bearer defeats a strike from an Undead attack, he may immediately take control of a non-food minor item (which may be taken from sideboard or hand). Shadow-magic user only: tap: assign a strike from an Undead attack his company faces to any character at a site in the same or an adjacent region. Bearer makes a CC modified by -2.

card.name: Gift of Deceit
card.text: Command. Playable on a Dúnadan, Dwarf,Elf or Man Warlord. tap: bring a skill card your Warlord can use from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). Warlord makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Gilraen
card.text: Unique. +4 EI against Arathorn II or Aragorn II. Against any manifestation of a Nazgul, + 5 to her prowess and his body if halved (round up). If you have both Gilraen and Arathorn II at the same site, you may take Estel from your sideboard to your hand.

card.name: Glory of Arnor Restored
card.text: Playable on a company containing a DÃºnadan with a a home site in Eriador. When this company successfully plays a unique hero faction at a site in Arthedain, Rhudaur, Cardolan or Angmar. tap this card and keep it tapped. Once tapped, invert it (180°) if the company enters a site in Angmar and successfully plays a Stolen Knowledge at the site. Once inverted, you receive 3 mp if stored at DÃºnadan-hold in Eriador. Additionally your companies may play Tower Raided at Carn Dûm as if a Shadow-hold [S]. This card is worth 2 additional mp if you also have receive at least one mp from Reunited Kingdom; it is worth full mp to an Atani-lord or Elrond Half-elven. Once inverted, no other copy of this card can be inverted.

card.name: Gold Reward
card.text: Playable on a non-overt minion character in lieu of declaring CvCC. Make an influence check against one of opponent's characters (+4 if a Ringwraith, +3 if diplomat). If the result is higher than the character's mind minus his corruption point total and CP-modifiers, place this card on him (tap the character if untapped). Discard this card to cancel any effect that would cancel CvCC with this character's company.

card.name: Grishmoigh
card.text: Unique. Ent. Giant. Playable at any Ruins & Lairs [R] in Enedhwaith or its adjacent regions, if you discard a Man, Dwarf, or Dúnadan trophy or prisoner from the company. All body checks for defeated Dúnadan and Man attacks of which Grishmoigh has faced a strike are modified by +1. tap: cancel a non-unique Giant, Troll or Awakend Plant attack keyed to a Wilderness [w] region (by type or name) against his company. Discard Grishmoigh if you have Fuel for Furnaces or a Dúnadan faction in play, or if Treebeard is in his company.

card.name: Helm of Illusions
card.text: Unique. Helmet. Place this card on Ardagor if he is in play. If on Ardagor he gains the diplomat skill. +3 EI against characters at whose home site you have a faction in play. Ardagor may play Counterfeit on himself as if he were an Orc. Playable with your starting company in lieu of a minor item.

card.name: Hostel of the Sisters of Nienna
card.graphics: Hostel of the Sisters of Nienna.jpg

attr.value: tap during the site phase to heal a character (from wounded to tapped, or from wounded to untapped if a Dúnadan character).

card.name: Hostel of the Sisters of Nienna
card.graphics: Hostel of the Sisters of Nienna2.jpg

attr.value: Dunedain 3 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
tap during the site phase to heal a character (from wounded to tapped, or from wounded to untapped if a Dúnadan character).

card.name: Iron-home
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a minion company. Discard this card to cancel a hazard creature attack against the company keyed to Angmar by name. Black player only: this card may be played with your starting company in lieu of a minor item. The company may start the game at Carn Dûm. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Linyuilë
card.text: Unique. Maia. Playable at Annúminas. Discard if her company is overt, or if she moves to a site not in Eriador. May not be attacked. Characters in her company may play light enchantments at any non-Haven site (even if tapped) and as if they were a sage (tap site if untapped), if they moved there this turn. tap: cancel a River or Enchanted Stream played against her company.

attr.value: Undead — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; any character wounded must make a second body check modified by +2 immediately following the first body check.

Hidden Site. Port. This site card may only be revealed if either Gates of Morning or Doors of Night is in play, and if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls. Any hazard creatures normally keyed to Coastal Sea [c] may be played at this site.
Undead — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; any character wounded must make a second body check modified by +2 immediately following the first body check.

Hidden Site. Port. This site card may only be revealed if either Gates of Morning or Doors of Night is in play, and if the company discards (for no effect) a Stolen Knowledge card it controls. Any hazard creatures normally keyed to Coastal Sea [c] may be played at this site.
(1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 6 prowess;(2nd) Opponent may play as second automatic-attack any copy of Wolf-riders: add together all strikes and consider it a single attack.
Orcs — 4 strikes with 6 prowess (detainment against overt company).
Any wolf ally playable at sites in Eriador, the Northern Waste or Wilderland may be played at this site.

card.name: No Good Roasting 'Em Now
card.text: Playable on a character facing a strike from a Troll creature attack. Unless the attack is keyed to Ruins & Lairs [R], the defending character receives +3 prowess against the strike. If the strike is successful, target character is not harmed and is taken prisoner at a Shadow-hold [S] or non-Dragon-lair Ruins & Lairs [R]. At the start of his untap phase, make a body check for that character modified by +1. Rescue-attacks (2): Troll - 1 strikes with 10 prowess, Troll - 1 strike with 12 prowess.

card.name: Of Which They Were Made
card.text: Playable on wounded troll. A wild troll may heal (from wounded to tapped) at a site within a Deep Wilderness [ww], if at an under-deep or under-deep surface site; half-trolls and Olog-hai must remove one trophy (two for an Olog-hai) they carry to heal, from wounded to tapped. Shuffle this card into your deck instead of discarding it, if another troll is wounded in the company.

card.name: Ognor
card.text: Unique. Hill Troll. +2 prowess against Ents and Awakened Plants. Discard on a body check of 8.

card.name: Olga-wama
card.text: Unique. Playable at Barrow-downs or Cameth Brin. Armor. Jewel. +1 body to a maximum of 8. Bearer may attach or detach any non-armor minor item he controls with Olga Wama during the organization phase; if placed with Olga Wama it gives no CP and cannot be used (none of its abilities apply). For each minor item attached, bearer gains +1 EI against Man factions playable at sites in Rhudaur, Cardolan and Dunland, and against Man characters with a home site in these regions.

card.name: Olog-power
card.text: Playable on a Troll. Bearer may use two-handed battle-gear items as if they were not two-handed. Additionally, if bearer taps to face a strike he may reduce his prowess by any factor of 3 to give -1 to the body of the strike. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Pretender
card.text: Diplomat only. Playable during the site phase on a diplomat in a covert company, if at the same site as an opponent’s hero character of the same race. Choose and discard a unique resource permanent-event played on the hero character. A Half-orc diplomat can play this card against a Man character and the event need not be unique.

card.name: Ranger of Arnor
card.text: May not be among the starting characters. May also be played at any non-hidden, non-Shadow-hold site in Cardolan or Rhudaur. Discard if you have Bad Company in play.

card.name: Rast Vorn
card.text: Playable on The Worthy Hills, if Woses of Eryn Vorn is in play. You may place any Drughu with this card; Any Drughu under this card may be played as if from hand on a company at The Worthy Hills, and you need not discard a ranger character. If you discard a Wose character along with Drughu, you may untap The Worthy Hills.

card.name: Reef
card.text: Playable on a company moving through a region that is a Coastal Sea [c]. Your opponent must choose a Ruins & Lairs [R] site located in a Coastal Sea [c] region the company is moving through. The site is used as the company’s new site. If no such site is available, the company must return to its site of origin. This card cannot be canceled by Great Ship.

card.name: Sceptre of Annúminas
card.text: Unique. Staff. Treasure. Playable at Rivendell on Elrond or Aragorn II, if Return of the King is in play. +2 EI against Dúnedain. Sceptre of Annúminas is worth 3 mp if The White Tree is in play at Annúminas. Cannot be stored.

card.name: Symbol of Malice
card.text: Magic. Shadow-magic. Playable on a site during the site phase by a shadow-magic using character. Tap the site (if not already tapped). This site is never discarded and never untaps for you.When a company enters any version of this site, each character in the company must make a CC modified by -2 and this card is discarded. Unless he is a Ringwraith, the shadow-magic using character makes a CC modified by -4.

card.name: Terror of Cardolan
card.text: Ardagor specific. Place this card on Ardagor if in play. Your companies with a company size of 2 or less, or that contain Ardagor may play allies at tapped sites. +1 CC for followers of Ardagor. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Tharbad's Thieves
card.text: Playable on a company moving in Cardolan or its adjacent regions. Company faces an attack Men — 1 strike with 15 prowess. Target characters are not harmed by this attack. For every successful strike one of the target company’s items of the attacker’s choice is placed “off to the side”. All such items are considered playable at Tharbad by any player (regardless of Tharbad’s tapped status and you may take the site from discard pile) after facing a Rescue Attack: Men — 3 strikes at 8 prowess.

card.name: The Dunmen's Dogs
card.text: Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven [H] site in Dunland, if the influence check is greater than 11.Standard Modifications: character with a home site in Dunland (+3), Dunlendings (+3), Wild Hounds (+3). One non-unique Wolf ally is playable at Dunnish Clan-hold each turn. Invert this faction to cancel a Wolf creature attack against a company and place the creature under control of a character that taps: creature becomes an ally, it has 1 mind, 7 body and a prowess equal to its normal prowess minus 7.

attr.value: (1st) Undead — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess;(2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack from hand or discard pile King of the Dead or a non-unique Demon or Pûkel-creature.
Contains a hoard. Any non-unique Undead creature may be keyed to the site.
Traps — 5 strikes with 11 prowess (detainment; cannot be cancelled)*

* prowess against these strikes is equal to the mind of defending character (10 for a Wizard); cards that modify a riddling attempt may be played to modify the prowess against a strike. An untapped character in the company may take a strike another character is facing. If any strike is succesful the site phase immediately ends.
Traps — 5 strikes with 11 prowess (detainment; cannot be cancelled)*

* prowess against these strikes is equal to the mind atribute of defending character (10 for a Ringwraith); cards that modify a riddling attempt may be played to modify the prowess against a strike. An untapped character in the company may take a strike another character is facing. If any strike is succesful the site phase immediately ends.
Creb Durga (0), The Gem-deeps (7), The Under-gates (6), The Under-vaults (9)
(1st) Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess; (2nd) Troll — 1 strike with 13 prowess.
Creatures normally keyed to Dark-hold [D] may be played at this site if Doors of Night is in play.
Creb Durga (0), The Gem-deeps (7), The Under-gates (6), The Under-vaults (9)
(1st) Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess;(2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack 1 non-unique hazard creature from his hand normally keyed to a Ruins & Lairs [R].
Non-Nazgul creatures played at this site attack normally, not as detainment. Any non-unique ally playable at any under-deeps site may be played here.

card.name: Thieves of Tharbad
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tharbad if the influence check is greater than 13.Standard Modifications: Dunlending (-3), if you discard an item from the company: minor (+3), major (+6), ring or treasure (+9). tap: take An Article Missing or Brigands from your discard pile to your hand. This faction cannot be tapped if Tharbad is not a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Treat any influence attempt against this faction as if it were not in play.

attr.value: Rangers of the North faction is playable at this site. Tap a Dúnadan ranger to make information playable at this site this turn. Tap a non-ranger Man or Dúnadan at this site to give that character ranger skill for the rest of the game. Place this card (or some other token) with the character when he leaves this site.
Tap a Dúnadan ranger or a sage to make information playable at this site this turn.

to heal a character (from wounded to untapped), make a roll). If the result plus the wounded character's mp is greaterthan 7, the character heals. Otherwise, discard thecharacter and all cards he controls. Woses of theEryn Vorn faction is playable at this site.

heal a character (from wounded to untapped), make a roll. If the result plus the wounded character's mp is greater than 7, the character heals. Otherwise, discard the character and all cards he controls. Woses of the Eryn Vorn faction is playable at this site.

card.name: Troll Henchman
card.text: Only one Troll Henchman may be in the company for each Troll leader or avatar present. Grond also affects Free-holds [F] two regions away from the site of the faction it was played on, if Troll Henchman is present there.

attr.value: Any site with a Troll automatic-attack

card.name: Troll-woods
card.text: Unique. Playable on Ettenmoors during the site phase. Replace the site's automatic attacks with: Trolls — 1 strike with 10 prowess (detainment against overt companies). Any non-unique Troll character can be playd at this site under EI or GI. Rhûdaur is considered to be a double Wilderness ww. Discard Troll-woods when the site is discarded or returned to its location deck.

card.name: Ufkral
card.text: Unique. Uruk-hai. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 7. +1 EI against Orcs. +2 EI against Snaga-hai and Wolf factions. Wolf allies he controls can take trophies. A Wolf ally with one trophy gains the scout skill; with three he gains the ranger skill.

card.name: Under His Fist
card.text: Command. Playable on a Warlord at a Darkhaven [K]. The Warlord may control any number of (different) command cards (these are not returned to his hand). At the end of your turn, if he controls more than 2 command cards, discard one of them.

card.name: Valglin
card.text: Unique. Elf. Noldo. Elf-lord or Pallando only. Playable at Amon Lind. tap: and discard a Stars or The Evenstar from hand to name a hazard: if opponent has this hazard in his hand, he must reveal it and choose to either discard it or lower the hazard limit against Valglin's company by 2 (to a minimum of 1). Otherwise he must reveal his hand.

card.name: Walls Behind Walls
card.text: Scout only. Stolen Knowledge. Playable by an untapped scout during the site phase at a Hidden Site. Tap the scout and place this card on him. You may discard this card to untap a Hidden Site or to discard any Concealed Entrance in play. Cannot be duplicated at a given site

card.name: Warlord
card.text: Black player only. Playable on a warrior leader with a normal mind of 7 or more, bearing at least 2 trophy mp. Character becomes a Warlord; he may only be controlled by your avatar or GI. +3 to his EI. You may only have a second copy of Warlord in play if you have 6 or more P, or a third if you have 10 or more P.

card.name: Warlord's Lair
card.text: Warlord only. Playable during the site phase at your Warlord's non-Haven, non- Dark-hold home site. Place this card on the site. The site becomes a Hidden Site and loses all automatic-attacks for you. Nothing is considered playable there as written on the site card. Your characters may heal at this site. Discard when the site leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Wolves' Feed
card.text: Play to untap a wolf ally, a Wolf faction, or a non-unique Scara-hai Orc. Alternatively, playable on a wolf ally facing a strike: if the strike is defeated the ally receives +2 body until the end of the turn.
